channel.title: Tool
channel.description:
Mhm, Tool have been around for ages?
[size=15pt][u]Metal, Rock, Alternative Metal[/u][/size] Tool is an American rock band that was formed in 1990 in Los Angeles, California. The band consists of drummer Danny Carey, bassist Justin Chancellor, guitarist Adam Jones, and vocalist Maynard James Keenan. Tool has won three Grammy Awards, hosted worldwide tours, and produced albums which have performed well on international music charts
Fancy a [url=http://www.dizzler.com/music/Tool]Listen?[/url] Best songs - The Pot 10,00 days Vicarious Lateralus Thanks <33 Ollie/Ooo Java

item.title: Tool
item.dc:creator: @regecks1 regecks`
item.description:
@regecks1 wrote:

Best song IMO is Lost Keys+Rosetta Stoned (same song different tracks afaik) from 10,000 days.

Check out A Perfect Circle off you’re a Tool fan, too. It’s a lot more political and not as “stoner”, but still enjoyable, a side project of Maynard’s.

Read full topic
